items.title: Voss Capital thinks the market is a ‘perpetual paradox machine’. Here are the stocks the fund manager owns.
items.description: Buying undervalued small-cap stocks that may attract bidders has worked this year, Voss Capital said.

items.title: One of my 3 children died — and left behind a child. I also have a second grandkid. What is the fairest way to divide my estate?
items.description: “Twenty-five percent each does not seem fair given that one child and grandchild could inherit half of my estate.”
